basics.name: Szilárd Dénes
basics.label: Geologist / Developer
summary: Once a geologist engineer in the hydrocarbon industry, I discovered my love for programming in high school, which I brought to my work as a geologist, where I utilized my analytical mindset to streamline tasks and solve complex problems.

I excelled in automating repetitive tasks and problem-solving through the use of datasets and variables. In 2018, I reignited my passion for programming, creating my own webshop and other websites such as munkaportal.ro, gpoauto.ro, and jointadventure.com. I also joined a project in VBA Excel scripting and ERP system setup and code (Python) for a company.

In July 2022, I decided to take a leap of faith and quit my Budapest-based 9-6 job, embarking on a new journey as a freelancer, balancing my passions for geology and programming. From developing Excel VBA add-ins to website design and coding in VB and C#, I continue to expand my skill set while working with a variety of geology-related companies.

Through it all, my personal website and blog, solid.garden, will serve as a platform to share my worldview, coding journey, and the progress of building my future home with my fiancé, our cat, Mr. Carrot, and rescued dog, Henna. With a passion for learning and an open mind to new opportunities, I am excited to see where my unique combination of skills will take me next.

highlights: loading 2D and 3D seismic surveys into Kingdom software
loading of 2D and 3D gathers
loading any kind of data
performing data quality control
converting coordinates from different UTM zones using QGIS
work.name: North American Helium
work.summary: I specialize in using IHS Kingdom Software to load 2D and 3D seismic surveys, load data, and perform data quality control. I have extensive experience in using IHS Kingdom Software and have developed expertise in data loading and quality control techniques.

highlights: I clean up the existing Excel add-ins to remove any unnecessary code, optimize performance, and make them more user-friendly. This involves restructuring the code, renaming variables, and adding comments to make it easier to read and understand.
If necessary, I also rewrite the add-ins in a more modern programming language, such as C#.

Throughout my work, I focus on delivering high-quality code and documentation that meets the needs of the end-users. By doing so, I help to ensure that our geotechnical engineering teams have access to the tools they need to do their jobs effectively.
work.name: Geoszféra Kft.
work.summary: As a Developer at Geoszféra Kft. I am responsible for revisiting Excel VBA Addons created by a former colleague. My role involves reviewing and modifying the code to ensure that it is functional, efficient, and error-free. To help users understand how to use these add-ons, I also write documentation that explains the purpose, functionality, and usage of each tool.

schematic UI/UX design
programming the website in SvelteKit, and hosting and managing the site

work.summary: I transferred a company's data, projects, and workflows from excel files and folders into the Odoo ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) system. Besides, I built a VBA-based Excel program that generates documents with a given database and different PDF templates.

highlights: Independently generated an inventory prospects, with several advanced to peer review stage and subsequent approval for drilling.

Completing Petroleum System Analysis (PSA) projects for the OGD's focus areas

Hydrocarbon migration modelling to address the migration risk in the prospect evaluation  process
Data mining, various geodatabase building (excel VBA scripting and ArcGIS)

High-level  data integration, including wells, seismic and  geochemistry. Everyday problem solving and workflow optimization at any level (geology, data, software).

references.name: Martin Olsen
references.reference: I've worked with Szilard for 6 years at O&G Development.  He wore many hats there and was very quick to climb learning curves -- even when the subject was complex.

references.name: Stephen Anfort
references.reference: From the first time I met Szilárd, I knew he was a high performer.  His dedication to completing assigned tasks, thinking on his feet and persistence in solving difficult problems made him an invaluable team member.  He performs far above the level of his experience, turning out quality work equivalent to his more experienced colleauges.
